Title: Directs the hiring of an independent investigator to investigate correctional facilities in the state
Summary: Directs the hiring of an independent investigator to investigate all 42 correctional facilities in the state to identify any negative policies and practices exiting as such correctional facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the hiring of an independent investigator to investigate correctional facilities in the state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
